prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon resembling a beaver with a big tail and a friendly smile.
I want a small, fluffy creature with brown fur and a playful demeanor to add to my collection.
Generate a Pokemon that has distinct features like big teeth, a flat tail, and a bright personality.
Make an adorable creature that thrives in wetlands and has characteristics of both land and water animals.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses its strong front teeth to build dams and has a charming, curious nature.
Design a Normal-type Pokemon that combines elements of a rodent and a playful aquatic animal.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a beaver and can evolve into a more powerful version over time.
